As Tris grows older and more aware of the world around her, she becomes increasingly disillusioned with the values that underpin each of these factions.
As a result of this growing disillusionment with the values that underpin each of these factions, Tris becomes increasingly motivated to try to find ways to change things about the way these values are currently understood and implemented.
